content: SPRINT 1 (Days 1-6): Legal Compliance Foundation - Implement sweepstakes model, age verification, geo-blocking, terms of service, and educational disclaimers
SPRINT 1: Dual Currency System - Build Gems (purchasable) and Coins (sweepstakes) with clear separation and compliance tracking
SPRINT 1: Educational Roulette Core - Basic roulette gameplay with educational tooltips, strategy guides, and practice mode
SPRINT 2 (Days 7-12): Social & Viral Features - Friends system, leaderboards, social sharing, referral program with rewards
SPRINT 2: Premium Subscription Tiers - VIP status, exclusive tables, bonus multipliers, priority support ($25M revenue driver)
SPRINT 2: Stripe Integration - Gem purchases, subscription billing, transaction tracking, refund handling
SPRINT 3 (Days 13-18): Advanced Gameplay - Multiple table types, tournaments, daily challenges, streak bonuses
SPRINT 3: Creator Economy Foundation - User-generated content, custom tables, revenue sharing for creators ($10M revenue driver)
SPRINT 3: Analytics & Optimization - User behavior tracking, A/B testing framework, conversion funnel analysis
SPRINT 4 (Days 19-24): Monetization Optimization - Dynamic pricing, personalized offers, commission system for transactions ($20M revenue driver)
SPRINT 4: Advertising Platform - Sponsored content integration, brand partnerships, native advertising ($5M revenue driver)
SPRINT 4: Retention & Engagement - Daily login rewards, achievement system, personalized recommendations, push notifications
